snippet: The film, starting Eric Bana, will not be released in theaters, but will have its worldwide debut on the streaming service.
abstract: Ricky Gervais movie Special Correspondents will premiere on Netflix in 2016.
lead_paragraph: The film, starting Eric Bana, will not be released in theaters, but will have its worldwide debut on the streaming service.

headline.main: Netflix Will Show Ricky Gervais’s Comedy ‘Special Correspondents’
headline.print_headline: Netflix to Debut Film by Gervais
